data.title: A Little Gem
data.text:
We had a celebratory anniversary dinner here and found it to be perfect.  The place has a nice ambience and thoughtful wait staff.  The menu is quite large and choices were difficult.  I wanted to keep my dinner on the smallish side because I wanted to finish it entirely due to the fact that we were traveling.  They offer abalone, a particular favorite of mine.  Extremely rare to find on a menu and I was delighted to find it.  The full dinner is $75.  But wait!  They offer a side (small plate) with just abalone for $25.  So that is what I ordered.  Incredible!  My husband ordered the Crispy Duck and proclaimed it to be perfection.

We will definitely return here the next time we visit Redding.  I recommend it to everyone.

data.title: Great Bar
data.text: I have not eaten at the restaurant yet but my wife and I met some of her friends from work here. Very comfortable.  The server was great. They have a nice assortment of beer on tap. Their bar food is a step above the average for sure. We had roasted Brussel sprouts, sweet potato chips and fish tacos at our table. A the food was very good. We'll go back!

data.title: One of the Finest in Redding
data.text: I have eaten here many times.  The service is excellent, and the food is exceptionally good.  I think it is the best restaurant in Redding.

data.title: Delightful find
data.text: Our B&B hostess highly recommended Clearie's, a quick walk for a happy hour dinner.  We entered into the bar area, before the dining room was open, to find an old-style bar reminiscent of the 1920s, with music to match.  So we were quite surprised to find an appetizer and small plates menu that was anything but retro.   We ordered a beer for my husband and and Italian soda while checking out the menu.  Lyndsey, our server, was friendly and accommodating when we asked for modifications of our dining choices:  a naan-based flatbread for me, and fried catfish on wilted veggies for my husband.  Both were unexpectedly delicious and upscale in presentation,  reasonably priced, and adequate to satisfy our smaller appetites  (I think the full dining menu was much pricier).  We'd go back in a heartbeat the next time we're in the area.

data.title: Best restaurant in Redding!
data.text: Clearie's is our choice for every special occasion! Absolutely everything is delicious. My favorite is the filet mignon meatloaf (which actually isn't really like meatloaf at all). They also make fantastic cocktails with seasonal specials on the food and bar menus. Excellent wine selection. The servers are amazing - they take their time with you and get to know your likes. Great place - can't say enough good things!

data.title: Pleasant Surprise
data.text: We booked this online after reading the reviews and weren't disappointed.  The menu had a variety of standard and more interesting options.  The decor is attractive but a bit dated (dark booths, cocktail/wine artwork, etc.). Food and service were fine, and dishes were extremely generous with creative preparations and presentations.  We enjoyed our frozen lemonade dessert, though it was large enough for four!

data.title: great lunch or dinner
data.text: always a pleasure dining here. great food for lunch or dinner. the wait staff are always pleasant. great atmosphere. brought my parents for there 70th wedding anniversary they always treat them so kind.

data.title: Great food, good specials
data.text: We did the early bird special. Yes, it's a bit early for dinner as you must order by 6. We've now tried all three entrees. The chicken Marsala is my favorite. Husband likes the filet mignon meatloaf. The catfish is pretty tasty also. The squash soup is absolutely delicious, as are those yummy roasted Brussels sprouts. Highly recommend.

data.title: Amazing
data.text: Wow this place is a hidden gem. The food was amazing and great service. Popular so call ahead for a reservation or eat at the bar. They were packed on a Wednesday night.

data.title: Excellent all the way around - just a little pricey for Redding
data.text: Got there in time for early dinner specials. The Chicken Marsala was excellent, wouldn't get the meatloaf again. Service was excellent. This was our second stop at this restaurant in the last 5 years (we live in Southern California). Would definitely recommend.

data.title: We Love It!!
data.text: We frequent Clearies for date night and when possible we enjoy lunch here as well! We've tried several things on the menu (which changes every so often FYI). Anyways, one of our favorite appetizers is the chorizo bruschetta, which is not your average bruschetta. Instead of being served cold, it is served warm with chorizo chunks  on a toast point with fresh marinara and parmesan. The bacon wrapped filet mignon meatloaf and the chicken Marsala are amazing. During lunch I would recommend going for one of their menu changing burgers. We've had quite a few different ones. One of my wife's favorite things is their shoestring garlic fries. They're made with fresh garlic and Parmesan. Delicious. The staff are very tentative and especially during lunch are very aware of time constraints. We will be back soon!

data.title: Delicious duck tacos!
data.text: We had a great dinner at Clearie's. I had the starter roasted beet salad, which was a perfect size, and the duck tacos, which were very tasty.  My daughter had the champagne salad and fish tacos, and enjoyed her meal too.  We ordered these items from the "small plates" menu and it was plenty of food.  We split the chocolate rangoons for dessert.  Our waitress was very attentive and friendly too.

data.title: Redding's Finest
data.text: Clearie's is one of Redding's finest! We were treated to a week-night dinner and everything was suburb! The atmosphere, the very friendly and helpful wait staff, the service, the presentation, and especially the taste of the food. The men enjoyed the filet mignon meatloaf—which is NOT your mother's meatloaf—so delicious I wanted to eat the leftovers the next evening at home. But alas, so did my hubs! We girls enjoyed the grilled catfish with a mango salsa. The whole party shared a Bananas Fosters Creme Brulee. Go to their website and drool: cleariesrestaurant.com. Warning: quite pricey, but such a great place for a celebration or a long evening dinning with friends.

data.title: Nice Place!
data.text:
The staff is friendly and welcoming. 

The menu changes so choices are never boring. 

The chef (s) take pride in their work.

data.title: Very overpriced!
data.text: Went there for our anniversary, and we don't mind paying for good food. But the food was average at best, with prices that reflect the owners ego and not the quality of the food. She probably should not have visited our table.

data.title: A nice fancy restaurant from a Burger Shack
data.text: The food is good, service is typical of a busy place, and a warning: the prices are high, For a special occasion I think its worth it.

data.title: Excellent meal and service
data.text: My girlfriend and I went to Clearie's and we found it charming, if a bit on the expensive side.  The bar area was nicely appointed with a comfortable feel to it.  I had the Pesto salmon and it was excellent.  The wait staff was very attentive and prompt.  We left full and with a smile on our face.  I would recommend this to anyone who wants an upscale appearance.

data.title: Best meal in Redding hands down
data.text:
If you want a quiet meal in an upscale restaurant in Redding look no further than Clearie's.
The food is way above the bar for what Redding has to offer and the service is beyond good for the area.
Robbie, the owner , is generally on site. This is not a chain meal house.
In my opinion the best meal in town......

data.title: Well return and try something different
data.text: Good presentation w the meatoaf but the salad dressing we had was bland (it was a flavorless watered down blue cheese) Expensive with small portions.

data.title: Nice dinner house for sit down occasions
data.text:
Restaurant has a long history in Redding.  Use to be Doc's years ago at another site.  Have always had a good meal. Service is good.
Recommend highly
